dominant-baseline.name: dominant-baseline
dominant-baseline.value: auto | text-bottom | alphabetic | ideographic | middle | central | mathematical | hanging | text-top
dominant-baseline.appliesTo: block containers, inline boxes, table rows, table columns, grid containers, and flex containers

alignment-baseline.name: alignment-baseline
alignment-baseline.value: baseline | text-bottom | alphabetic | ideographic | middle | central | mathematical | text-top | bottom | center | top
alignment-baseline.appliesTo: inline-level boxes, flex items, grid items, table cells

baseline-shift.name: baseline-shift
baseline-shift.appliesTo: inline-level boxes, flex items, grid items
baseline-shift.percentages: refer to the used value of line-height
baseline-shift.computedValue: the specified keyword and/or a computed <length-percentage> value

line-height.name: line-height
line-height.computedValue: the specified keyword, a number, or a computed <length> value

leading-trim-over.name: leading-trim-over
leading-trim-over.value: normal | text | cap | ex | ideographic | ideographic-ink

leading-trim.name: leading-trim
leading-trim.value: normal | text | cap | ex | ideographic | ideographic-ink

initial-letters.name: initial-letters
initial-letters.appliesTo: certain inline-level boxes and ::first-letter and inside ::marker boxes (see prose)
initial-letters.computedValue: the keyword normal or a number paired with an integer

initial-letters-align.name: initial-letters-align
initial-letters-align.value: border-box? [ alphabetic | ideographic | hebrew | hanging ] | border-box
initial-letters-align.appliesTo: certain inline-level boxes and ::first-letter and inside ::marker boxes (see prose)

initial-letters-wrap.name: initial-letters-wrap
initial-letters-wrap.appliesTo: certain inline-level boxes and ::first-letter and inside ::marker boxes (see prose)
initial-letters-wrap.percentages: relative to logical width of (last fragment of) initial letter
